pr_title: HDDS-4481. With HA OM can send deletion blocks to SCM multiple times.

timeline.bodyText:
createWriteRaftClientRequest was creating a request with the same callId. Is that the bug here?
If that is the case we would also need to make changes in this function so that callId is different for every request.
timeline.author: lokeshj1703

replies.bodyText:
When called from Client, Server.getCallID() will not return constant value RpcConstants.INVALID_RETRY_COUNT.
Where as when keydeletingService is called it is not coming thru RpcClient, directly calling server API submitRequest, so CallID will be same for each call.
So it is fine use createWriteRaftClientRequest for normal flow of requests, and the values ClientID and CallID can be fetched from Server.getClientID and Server.getCallID().
replies.author: bharatviswa504

replies.bodyText: Can we add an assertion to check that Server.getCallID() is not returning RpcConstants.INVALID_CALL_ID and Server.getClientId() is not returning RpcConstants.DUMMY_CLIENT_ID?
replies.author: lokeshj1703

timeline.message: HDDS-4481. With HA OM can send deletion blocks to SCM multiple times.
fix cs and make clientID static, so that until OM is stopped it will have same value
